poems.title: Silence
poems.author: A. S

poems.title: Shadows of light
poems.content:
Darkness is required to see the light,
Walk through it towards your light.

Your shadows reveal what truly matters,
Till morning comes and darkness scatters.
poems.author: A. S

poems.title: Where Flowers Bloom
poems.content:
A flower blooms only once,
But the flower shall bloom again, somewhere else.

Perhaps at the same place, but on a different day,
Be someone's different day.
poems.author: A. S

poems.title: Middle of the Sea
poems.content:
A distant dropping sun,
teasing waves with endless stories to tell,
and you make my perfect evening.
poems.author: A. S

poems.title: Footprints
poems.content:
I love what a wave can do to the shore.
teasing waves with endless stories to tell,
and you make my perfect evening.
poems.author: A. S

quotes.text: We touch with our eyes, not just with our hands.
quotes.author: A. S

quotes.text: I love black coffee, travel and you.
quotes.author: A. S

quotes.text: There is no reason to love someone. If it's love then you wouldn't need one.
quotes.author: A. S

quotes.text:
I love what a wave can do to the shore.
No matter how deep the footprints are,she will always heal him.
quotes.author: A. S

quotes.text: What feels like fun to you but work to others - do that often.
quotes.author: A. S

quotes.text: Why be a choice when you can be the chosen?
quotes.author: A. S
